detaileddescription.para: Daivik Nema Structs for initializing and training HMMs (either of Discrete, Gaussian, GMM, or Diagonal GMM HMMs). These structs are passed as template parameters to the PerformAction function of an HMMModel object. These structs have been adapted from the structs in mlpack/methods/hmm/hmm_train_main.cpp.
